data.title: The 25 Best Shows Like 'Futurama', Ranked By Fans
data.meta_description: The 25 Best Shows Like 'Futurama', Ranked By Fans, as voted on by fans. Current Top 3: Archer, Final Space, Rick and Morty
data.text:
Are you a Futurama fan looking for new series to dive into? Look no further. This is a list of shows that capture the spirit, humor, and creativity of Matt Groening's sci-fi masterpiece. Whether you're searching for animated comedies with sharp wit, satires filled with social commentary, or shows that blend fantastical elements with hilarious scenarios, there's something here for every Futurama enthusiast. The series on this list feature similar themes and tones to Futurama, offering a perfect mix of clever writing and imaginative storytelling.

One of the standout picks, Rick and Morty, provides a wild interdimensional escapade filled with dark humor and mind-bending plots, making it an excellent follow-up for fans of Futurama's whimsical yet intellectually stimulating adventures. Meanwhile, The Orville, created by Seth MacFarlane delivers not just cutting satire but also heartfelt moments exploring human relationships and existential themes. These shows offer a unique yet familiar touch that will resonate deeply with Futurama lovers.

This list has been carefully compiled using votes from Rankers like you, ensuring it's tailored to what fellow fans truly enjoy. From the absurd adventures in Aqua Teen Hunger Force to the heartfelt and fantastical tales in Adventure Time, each show captures the spirit of what made Futurama so beloved. They offer a mix of humor, drama, and imaginative settings that will transport you to new and exciting worlds.

Donâ€™t worry about where to find these shows; we've included convenient "Where to Watch" buttons below each show for streaming on platforms like Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, Disney+, Apple+, Paramount+, and Max, among others. This ensures you can easily start enjoying these fantastic series without any hassle. Just click on your preferred streaming service, and you'll be set for a new binge-watching adventure.

Be sure to vote up your favorite items on the list and help your fellow Rankers discover the best shows to watch after Futurama. Your votes play a crucial role in shaping this collection and guiding others to their next favorite series. So, dive in, explore these fantastic shows, and get ready for an exhilarating ride through some of the most hilarious series the world of television has to offer.
